title: Fifteen52 Wheels Founders Matt & Brad
description:
What's it take to make a good wheel? These guys know, and they know their cars, too. Matt Crooke and Brad Beardow are the founders of Fifteen52 wheels, casting and forging awesome wheels for your car, whether for the street or track. From tuning VWs to bolting shoes on the Hoonicorn, they've done a lot. 

https://fifteen52.com/

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/sKDtysKo69w


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @mattcrooke  @bradbeardow
 
Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
